Texts.Eng: During the Harrowing, we remember those we lost, but we also have fun with masks, costumes and sweet candy! If you can ^green;prove to me you're not scared of ghosts ^reset;by ^green;bringing me ^orange;20 Phase Matter^reset;, I'll give you some cool Harrowing items to get you started!
You don't scare easily, that's for sure! Here's some items to get you in the mood for the Harrowing!
